document.full_text: french open champion and home favorite francesca schiavone lost in the quarter-finals of the italian open on friday as samantha stosur gained revenge for defeat in last year's roland garros final.
document.title: schiavone falls to stosur, wozniacki marches on
lines_and_colors: french open champion and home favorite francesca schiavone lost in the quarter-finals of the italian open on friday as samantha stosur gained revenge for defeat in last year's roland garros final.
